Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.  [instruction 1 of 6]
Hello
hi
Hello, how can I help?
I need to check my ride status, can you help? My name is Alexis and ride ID is 525

Events.Text: When are you going to start your trip?

PrimaryItem.RideStatus: Your ride is on its way.

DetailedDrivingInstructions: Drive east (towards the tall brown building) on Forbes towards Murray
Turn right at the Starbucks and drive for 1.6 kilometers. Once you see a brown church, turn left on Murray

Your destination will be on the right just after the fire station.

Events.Text:
Unfortunately John is not able to make Sunday @ 3 pm.
Would you like to try scheduling the meeting for a different day or time?
Oh yeah! I forgot I had a conflict that time anyways with an old friend.  Is 4 PM on Monday available?

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Alexis

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Check your ride's status (e.g. ride id 525)
- Get walking/driving/transit directions (e.g. from 'Airport' to 'Broadway and Main') 
- Schedule a meeting
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. Los Angeles or Pittsburgh)
Scenario.WizardTask: Follow the flow charts and help the user.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
